title: Hour 1: The Shipping Container Is In Sync
description:
The show unveils its Halloween costumes to kick off Hour 1! Stephen A. Smith says he's underpaid, and Mike Schur is BACK with multiple submissions for his Stat of the Day, a discussion on political ads, and the problem with Elon Musk taking over Twitter and forcing people to pay for verification. Then, a video of "the making of" the McRib and a delightful College Football weekend.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
